Class UserPlane

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
com.example.demo.actors.ActiveActor
com.example.demo.actors.ActiveActorDestructible
com.example.demo.actors.FighterPlane
com.example.demo.actors.UserPlane
All Implemented Interfaces:
Destructible, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class UserPlane extends FighterPlane
Represents the player's plane in the game.

The UserPlane can move, fire projectiles, and take damage.
